title: WTB - T206 Cobb Bat Off or T205 Cobb
author: canjond

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Cobb Bat Off or T205 Cobb
posts.post_content:
Grade/back scarcity is not important to me.  I would, however, prefer a card with strong eye appeal (and no paper loss).  If you have either available, please feel free to send me a scan and your asking price.

Thanks and happy holidays.

[url]jon_canfield@hotmail.com[/url]

Jon--I have a duplicate T206 Cobb Bat Off with the Factory 42 ovpt back. It is an SGC40 that I bought from Ted for $950, which is what he paid Barry Sloate for it when he bought it from him. In keeping with tradition, I would be happy to sell it to you for $950. If you want scans send me an email at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Best---Jay
